typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Emp_no as string,
		{ Emp_name} as string,
		{ Department} as string,
		{ City} as string,
		{ LastUpdated_Date} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empcsv
source(output(
		Emp_no as string,
		Emp_name as string,
		Department as string,
		City as string,
		LastUpdated_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> refTable
empcsv, refTable exists(empcsv@Emp_no == refTable@Emp_no,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExists
empcsv, refTable exists(empcsv@Emp_no == refTable@Emp_no,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow
NotExists sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Emp_no,
		{ Emp_name},
		{ Department},
		{ City},
		{ LastUpdated_Date}
	)) ~> NewDataSink
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Emp_no as string,
		Emp_name as string,
		Department as string,
		City as string,
		LastUpdated_Date as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UpdatedDataSink
